p: As the microstructure and composition depend strongly on the experimental conditions (Kriven & Pask, 1983 ▸), different phase diagrams of the system SiO 2–Al 2O 3 emerged over the decades (Aramaki & Roy, 1959 ▸; Aksay & Pask, 1974 ▸; Klug et al., 1987 ▸). A comprehensive review discussed that the 1974 and 1987 phase diagrams, though exhibiting clear differences, are both correct with reference to the different experimental approaches (Aksay et al., 1991 ▸). The characteristics of the phase diagram, especially the borders of the stable solid solution range, could never be explained on a fundamental level.
